description: This talk was about Storybook.js, a tool to develop and document components libraries.
Lessons learned on the development of a responsive, accessible and multilingual component system integrated by a separate development team for a Liip customer.
An introduction to front-end development given to the first batch of PowerCoders Lausanne interns.
This talk was an introduction to PixiJS, a library to create performant 2D Canvas.
A one-day workshop about object-oriented CSS I gave to some of my colleagues.
Tips and tricks to create reusable, performant, object-oriented CSS component libraries.
